data.title: Lance Henriksen Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Lance Henriksen on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Lance Henriksen including Tarzan, Aliens, and more.
data.text:
A Beautiful Disaster

When an UnSub targets the BAU, the team goes into action to find out who is responsible.

Close Encounters of the Murderous Kind

When a prominent astrophysicist is found dead in her car, Castle is led to theorize her death was the result of an alien abduction.

Odd Man Out

Richard throws everyone for a loop when he switches the resident and attending pairings, and Arizona takes a huge risk on a woman who is pregnant with quadruplets. Meanwhile, April is faced with a difficult decision.

South By Southwest

The death of a NCIS agent leads Gibbs and Tony into the desert to locate a woman who holds the answer to the mystery.
